Brookhaven.Buckhead Theatre:
The Buckhead Theatre is a theatre located in the Buckhead neighborhood of Atlanta, Georgia.


== History ==
The establishment was built in 1930 in Spanish baroque style by Atlanta architecture firm Daniell & Beutell and opened on June 2, 1930. Primarily functioning as a second-run movie theater, it also hosted civic functions and concerts of the Buckhead Symphony Orchestra.
